author: BBC News
description: France's new president says it is 'the only reaction' for fighting populism.
title: France's Macron calls for 'historic reconstruction' of Europe

author: Alle Beiträge von Reuters  anzeigen.
description: Air-France-KLM schließt ein erneutes Engagement bei der italienischen Fluggesellschaft Alitalia aus. Noch vor ein paar Jahren wollte Air France-KLM den Konkurrenten übernehmen. Auch andere Fluggesellschaften winken ab.
title: Air France-KLM: Kein Interesse an Alitalia-Übernahme mehr

author: Ingrid Melander and Michel Rose
description: France's centrist President Emmanuel Macron named his government on Wednesday, appointing a mix of political hues to the top jobs as part of his promise to bridge the right-left divide.
title: France's Macron mixes political shades in ministerial appointments

author: Simon Book
description: Die Krisenairline Air France ist wie ein Vorläufer für die Probleme, auf die Frankreichs neuer Präsident Emmanuel Macron mit seinem Reformkurs stoßen wird. Dort läuft schief, was auch in Frankreich schiefläuft.
title: Macrons Reformkurs: Warum Air France ein Sinnbild für Frankreichs Probleme ist

author: Colin  Daileda
description: In France and the Netherlands, Facebook is allegedly violating user privacy.
title: European nations fine Facebook over being cagey with users' data

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Former France Coach Raymond Domenech maintains Real Madrid “are certainly the favourites against Juventus” for the Champions League.
title: Domenech: 'Madrid to beat Juventus'

description: To the chagrin of leftists, France’s new president ceded control of budget and economy to the political right.
title: Macron’s ‘radical centrism’ sure looks a lot like conservatism

description: France's centrist President Emmanuel Macron names his government, appointing a mix of people from politics and civil society.
title: Egalite in Macron's new government, with gender balance and mix of left and right

author: Madeline Farber
description: France now has a chance of boasting more women in parliament than all but two countries.
title: French President Emmanuel Macron’s Cabinet Is Half Female

author: Amar Toor
description: Social network fined $166,400 in France for failing to inform users of how their data is used
title: Facebook is still violating user privacy, Dutch and French regulators say
